api_list.name: v1/teams
api_list.description: Get hockey teams information including their id, venue details, division, conference and franchise information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hockey1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/nhl/teams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hockey1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hockey1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/nhl/teams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hockey1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
